description: Installation of six temporary secondary glazing units to windows on front elevation at ground floor, first, second and third floor levels for noise mitigation during construction of the HS2 railway.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
2021/5017/L - Listed Building Consent application for the installation of one (1) temporary mechanical ventilation unit to the front of the building at third floor level for noise mitigation works during construction of the HS2 railway. This application was granted consent on 30-11-2021.

2022/3832/L - Listed Building Consent application for the installation of four (4) temporary mechanical ventilation units to the front of the building at ground, first, and second floor levels for noise mitigation works during construction of the HS2 railway. This application was granted consent on 11-10-2022.
